org.js4ms.io.channel

Interface MessageInput<MessageType>

  • Type Parameters:
    MessageType - The message object type.
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    DuplexChannel<MessageType>, InputChannel<MessageType>, MessagePipe<MessageType>, MulticastEndpoint, UdpEndpoint
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AmtMulticastEndpoint, InputChannelAdapter, InputChannelFilter, InputChannelPipe, InputChannelTransform, MessageQueue, UdpInputChannel, UdpSocketEndpoint

    public interface MessageInput<MessageType>
    Interface exposed by objects that can be used to receive a message from a message source.
    Author:
    Greg Bumgardner (gbumgard)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Object EOM
      Special message object used to indicate that the source has stopped producing messages.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      MessageType receive(int milliseconds)
      Attempts to retrieve a message from a message source and if necessary, waits the specified amount of time until a message becomes available.

    • Field Detail

      • EOM

        static final Object EOM
        Special message object used to indicate that the source has stopped producing messages.

    • Method Detail

      • receive

        MessageType receive(int milliseconds)
                    throws IOException,
                           InterruptedIOException,
                           InterruptedException
        Attempts to retrieve a message from a message source and if necessary, waits the specified amount of time until a message becomes available.

        Some implementations may choose to return the static Object EOM to indicate that the source has stopped producing messages.

        Parameters:
        milliseconds - The amount of time allotted to complete the operation.
        Returns:
        A MessageType object or the object EOM.
        Throws:
        IOException - The receive operation has failed.
        InterruptedIOException - The receive operation was interrupted or timed out.
        InterruptedException - The calling thread was interrupted before the receive operation could complete.
